image_prompt: A dimly lit room with a single figure slumped on a chair, head in hands. Rain streaks down the window, blurring the cityscape outside. The color palette is muted blues and grays, conveying a sense of weariness and solitude.
bgm_prompt: A slow, melancholic piano piece with ambient textures. The tempo is very slow, creating a spacious and introspective atmosphere. Hints of cello add depth and a touch of sadness. The overall style is Lo-fi Ambient, designed to evoke feelings of loneliness and quiet reflection, gradually transitioning to a slightly warmer tone with the introduction of strings to represent hope and comfort.
